name: Stranded (itch) (IONPowered)
description:
You're stranded in the middle of the ocean on an isolated island. All that you have is some luggage that washed ashore from the plane crash. You must find a way to build a radio to create a connection with the outside world to get help. CONTROLS

Day 1:

  • Player Movement - WASD
  • Camera Movement - Mouse
  • Interact with Objects - E

Day 2:

  • Activate Screwdriver by clicking it
  • Put screwdriver down by clicking on the briefcase
  • Hold screwdriver over screws and left click to remove them
  • After screws are raised, click on them with an empty hand to remove them
  • After all screws are removed from a piece, click on the piece to remove it

Day 3:

  • Use the W and S keys to turn the left radio dial
  • Use the A and D keys to turn the right radio dial

Made as part of the College Game Jam by Theo Linardic and David de Sousa.

Additional Assets Used:

  • "Wicked Grit" Font
  • "Schoolwork" Font
  • Sound Effects from Zapslat & FreeSound
  • Menu music from Incompetech 
  • Models and textures created by us using Blender and Asset Forge
  • Using Unity Game Engine
